The new President wants to punish women who seek abortion. Today I donated to @EMILYsListAus and @Catholic4Choice. #timetoorganise
The best way for Oz to respond to this? Don't tweet 'I told you so' or argue with anyone on social media. Be kind. #LoveTrumpsHate

Got teeth cleaned today while the Clinton / Trump debate played on a screen above my head. Just like that scene in A Clockwork Orange.
@SquirterMc it was subtle
@SquirterMc yes the 28th was a joke. Trump got the election date wrong in a speech overnight.
Everyday I look forward to a coffee on the couch & finding out what f*cked up thing Trump has done overnight. What will I do after Nov 28th?
